TheWord.Title: As you know this is Me walking through tonight. I have found a man from the LORD.

Remember.Commentary: Yuri Japanese Restaurant. 3810 Mowry Avenue, Fremont CA 94538. Tel: (510) 945-6701. Moses said, to the LORD God, I beseech You, show me Your glory (Exodus 33:18).

BibleWord.Commentary: As for Me, behold, My covenant is with you, and you shall be a father of many nations (Genesis 17:4).

Jesus saw them toiling in rowing; for the wind was contrary unto them: and about the fourth watch of the night He came unto them, walking upon the sea, and would have passed by them (Mark 6:48). He looked up, and said, I see men as trees, walking (Mark 8:24). They came again to Jerusalem: and as He was walking in the temple, there come to Him the chief priests, and the scribes, and the elders (Mark 11:27). Knowing this first, that there shall come in the last days scoffers, walking after their own lusts (2 Peter 3:3).
